data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Zhong, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2012): New species of the genus Lathrobium Gravenhorst (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae) from Guangxi, South China. Zootaxa 3389: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208404
